Package eventorganizer

Class Event

java.lang.Object
eventorganizer.Event
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Event>
public class Event extends Object implements Comparable<Event>
Creates an event with a date, timeslot, location, contact, and duration
Author:
Palak Singh, Daniel Guan

  • Constructor Details

    • Event

      public Event(Date date, Timeslot startTime, Location location, Contact contact, int duration)
      Constructor to set the attributes of event
      Parameters:
      date - date of event
      startTime - timeslot start time of event
      location - building and campus location of event
      contact - department and contact email for event
      duration - time duration of event

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object event)
      Determines whether two events are the same date, location, and timeslot
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      event - the event to be compared to
      Returns:
      true if the events are on the same date, location, and timeslot; false if different

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Event event)
      Compares two events based on their date and timeslot
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Event>
      Parameters:
      event - the event to be compared to
      Returns:
      -1 if the given event is before the parameter event 1 if the given event is after the parameter event 0 if both events are planned to occur at the same time

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides the toString method to print the full event description
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String event description in the following format [Event Date: date] [Start: startTime] [End: endTime] @location (building, campus) [Contact: email]
